products.title: Voile FR Cobalt Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their flame retardant voile range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary. This dark blue, almost navy, electric roller blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice. Their electric roller blinds removes the need for a control chain, making it inherently child safe. Their voile cobalt blue roller fabric is also allergy resistant which means it is the best choice for bedrooms and kitchens. At swift direct blinds, their modern, electric roller blinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with their high quality products, that this roller blind is covered with their free 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in their blinds.

products.title: Palette Atlantic Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their palette range is available in a whole spectrum of colour so you can find the one that is perfect for you. This bold blue roller blind is the perfect choice to add a splash of colour to any room in your home. The electric aspect of this blind means it is easy to use and perfect for those difficult to reach windows. products.title: Whitby Blackout PVC Navy Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Whitby pvc blackout navy blue is a fabulous boys blind in dark navy that features a super modern cityscape of houses and trees that really lends itself well to a contemporary space. The electric operation makes opening and closing this flame retardant blind super-easy and the blackout fabric prevents unwanted light travelling into your room on a bright day. What's more, it's made of moisture resistant material so you don't have to worry if it gets splashed with water.

products.title: Quackers PVC Blackout Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Instantly add something fun and quirky with quackers pvc blackout blue electric roller blind. It's is made of moisture resistant fabric so is ideal for a childrens room or bathroom, it features a selection of amusing rubber duckies sitting on top of blue pebbles. The flame retardant electric blind operation makes it easy to open and close and with blackout fabric, the children wont be disturbed by early morning light.

products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Kimono Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.description: With a restful, japanese floral pattern, this electric roller blind delivers an air of zen. Intricate watercolour florals sit on graceful branches coloured in soft grey with hint of blue on a white background. Cherry blossom blackout kimono blue blackout roller blind adds the perfect finishing touch to an elegant, simple room. The blind is finished in a fabulous blackout faux silk fabric and it is pollergen treated using a specialist finish that helps to relieve hayfever symptoms by neutralising pollen.
